headline: Northern Trust (NTRS): Exploring Valuation as Analyst Optimism Rises Ahead of Q3 Earnings
summary: Several major Wall Street firms have raised their outlook for Northern Trust (NTRS) just as the company prepares to report its third-quarter results. This upswing in sentiment is fueling fresh investor interest. See our latest analysis for Northern Trust. After a relatively steady year, Northern Trust's total shareholder return is up just over 0.5% for the past twelve months. This is not dramatic, but the stock has recently attracted more attention thanks to upbeat analyst sentiment and a new...
